title: Officer apparently hurt in shooting in El Paso’s Upper Valley

text: EL PASO, Texas (KTSM) — An officer has apparently been hurt and is being transported to a local hospital after what El Paso Police are calling an officer-involved shooting on Sunday afternoon in El Paso’s Upper Valley.Police have responded to what is being called an officer-involved shooting along the 6400 block of Passo Via Drive in El Paso’s Upper Valley. html:
EL PASO, Texas (KTSM) — An officer has apparently been hurt and is being transported to a local hospital after what El Paso Police are calling an officer-involved shooting on Sunday afternoon in El Paso’s Upper Valley.

The incident happened at about 3:15 p.m. along the 6400 block of Passo Via Drive.

Police said that an officer is being transported to a local hospital, but didn’t say how they were hurt or how badly.

Our crew on the scene reports a heavy police presence throughout the neighborhood and people are urged to stay away and seek alternate routes if traveling through the area.

Information is limited at this time but we will update this story as soon as we learn more.
